entities.name: dragomir despard
entities.description: Dragomir Despard is introduced as a fictional foreigner who speaks little English and is in sympathy with the Dark Lord's aims. He has traveled from Transylvania to see the new regime.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is introduced as Dragomir Despard, a fictional foreigner who speaks little English and is in sympathy with the Dark Lord's aims.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger needs to visit Gringotts.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is introduced as someone who consorts with the long-fingered friends (Goblins) and has a fear of dirtying himself.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who feels threatened by Travers' words.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is the bank that Hermione and Travers need to visit.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is where Hermione and Travers are currently located.

entities.name: transylvania
entities.description: Transylvania is the location from which Dragomir Despard has traveled to see the new regime.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord's aims are in sympathy with Dragomir Despard.

relationships.description: Travers' words make Griphook feel threatened.
Travers consorts with the long-fingered friends (Goblins).
Dragomir Despard is in sympathy with the Dark Lord's aims.
